item.title: Download Sante FFT Imaging 1.4.4
item.description: Sante FFT Imaging is a program to remove sample noise from DICOM and simple images (jpg, tif, png and bmp). This type of noise is very common in images that have been digitized with a CR digitizer. The program uses a Fast Fourier Transform (FFT), a convolutional low-pass filter in the frequency domain or/and direct frequency deletion to remove sample noise. Main features: Fourier transform Fourier transform is a mathematical tool used to convert images from the spatial domain to the...
